请问权限是什么/manuaddp 玩家 权限
自己看权限节点:Command
Perm
Description
repairessentials.repairAllow access to the /repair command.repairessentials.repair.allUnlock the /repair all abilityrepairessentials.repair.armorRepair all also repairs equipped armor.repairessentials.repair.enchantedRepairing of enchanted items.Noneessentials.signs.break.repairControls who can break repair signs.Noneessentials.signs.create.repairControls who can create repair signs.Noneessentials.signs.use.repairControls who can use repair signs.
